ygData.subject: RE: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Kyle tells the group: what is a grimfeather? Sylly tells the group: Pull!  Sylly Songsynger  Bard of the 35th song somewhere on
ygData.messageBody:
Kyle tells the group: what is a grimfeather?

Sylly tells the group: Pull!

<eg>

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 35th song
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. Level 35 - MistMoore Drums - NOT encumbered and he waxed me! Have a go
for yourself <hehe>

p.s.s. he resisted my charm too! I foolishly tried to taunt him off a lev
18 bard who accidentally got in his way

p.s.s.s. he only cons yellow to me at 35 so at 40 I am pretty sure you can
take him solo

p.s.s.s.s. just remember how green Gix is <ehhehe> and other named mobs


-----Original Message-----
From: Kyle Q [mailto:kyleq@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 10:26 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kith Nerfed!!! Re: Undead
drops in Kithicor

From: "Kyle Q" <kyleq@...>

Haven't run into Grimfeather or Shadowed men yet. But even
if they could
outrun a lower lvl bard, I doubt they could outrun a bard
past lvl 40. Bard
speed is just sick at that point.
